force_destroy.description: If true, objects will be deleted from the bucket automatically when terminating the product. If false, all objects must be deleted from the bucket before terminating the product.

read_principal_arns_csv.description: Optional. Grant AWS principals read access to the bucket. Example: arn:aws:iam::111111111111:role/RoleOne,arn:aws:iam::111111111111:role/RoleTwo

write_principal_arns_csv.description: Optional. Grant AWS principals write access to the bucket. Example: arn:aws:iam::111111111111:role/RoleOne,arn:aws:iam::111111111111:role/RoleTwo
